original_title: ザ・ラスト・アイドル・デビュー 夢見照うた
overview: A miracle beautiful girl who declined all while passing all the final auditions of those three major idol groups representing Japan. What drove her to the path of an idol, the hesitation and anxiety of the moment when that path was about to open in front of her, and her firm determination. A pretty 148cm muse bets her life to open up a new era in AV.
title: The Last Idol Debut Uta Yumemite
